categories: Category:Songs by Boba Fett and the Assassin Droids

nodes.text: "Blow 'em All Away" was a song released by the band Boba Fett and the Assassin Droids as a single in the period of time between the years 0 ABY and 4 ABY. Composed in the Core Drive genre, the song was banned by the Imperial Board of Culture, who considered the track to be anti-Imperial.

"Blow 'em All Away" was first mentioned in the 1993 book Galaxy Guide 9: Fragments from the Rim, a supplement to West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game written by Simon Smith and Eric Trautmann.
